name: Dorothy Cosonas
biography: Today award-winning designer Dorothy Cosonas is Creative Director of both KnollTextiles and Knoll Luxe. She comes from an artistic background, with a grandfather who was a painter and mother was an architecture renderer. Cosonas graduated from the Fashion Institute of Technology with a degree in fine arts and textile design. She worked under Sina Pearson, textile designer at Unika Vaev, and then became the company’s Director of Design and later Vice President.  Her process includes looking at New York City and fashion. The city’s colors and patterns inspire her to design schemes. She is interested in creating color and pattern schemes that are clear and bold.
